data.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
data.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
Event Sched…

relatedRecords.name: Code BEAM SF
relatedRecords.description: Code BEAM SF is the only conference in the USA where we bring all the languages that run on the BEAM together. Discover how Erlang and Elixir are being used in industries and areas including IOT, Blockchain, Fintech, Security, Machine Learning and many more.
